if(cdek_delivery){setRussianPostPickupPrice(Math.floor((cdek_delivery.delivery_sum*1.1-cdek_delivery.delivery_sum*1.1*0.2)/5)*5);setRussianPostPickupTime(cdek_delivery.period_min+2);}else{// ??
}}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching tariffs:',error);});if(city.boxberry_city_code){Api.getBoxberryTariff(city.boxberry_city_code).then(response=>{let
